review: I enjoy the variety of prime content as well as the ability to sideload apps like Kodi. This made it very easy to decide to cut the cord with the cable companies. I was concerned about the wifi connection because I've read and heard from the best buy sales people that it will drop connectivity frequently, after 3 months of daily use I have not had this issue come up once.
author: Kindle Customer

review: Very happy with this product!  My last trip to the movies inspired my purchase.  My home has a movie room, but I was reluctant to try various streaming devices.  Boy was I wrong.  I not only save money now, but I enjoy my movie room!  I had to install the extension provided with the product.  Without the extension, I had buffering and connection problems.  Very happy with this product!!!!
